title: Issues in education: the Chief Executive - schooling P-12
creator_credit: Trevor Lunn and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: Dr. Graham Allen, Chief Executive, Ministry of Education, explains Victoria’s school curriculum plan for preparatory level to Year 12. The objective is to have the maximum number of students completing Year 12. The curriculum includes a broad education spectrum up to Year 10, with specialized subjects during Years 11-12, enabling astudents to pursue further education or to join the workforce with a knowledge of current technology.
